citations.narrative:
Completed records were not available for review for at the time of inspection. The licensee sold two Yorkie puppies in
November 2024. The records presented during the inspection did not contain all the required information as per this
section in the AWA. APHIS forms 7005 and 7006 must be completed with the required information for each dog
acquisition and disposition, respectively. These documents must be made available to APHIS officials for review during
inspections.
********Correct by 2/3/25 or for all future acquisitions and dispositions
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors 
Completed records were not available for review for at the time of inspection. The licensee sold two Yorkie puppies in 
November 2024. The records presented during the inspection did not contain all the required information as per this 
section in the AWA. APHIS forms 7005 and 7006 must be completed with the required information for each dog 
acquisition and disposition, respectively. These documents must be made available to APHIS officials for review during 
inspections.  
********Correct by 2/3/25 or for all future acquisitions and dispositions 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
